name: AllthingsOrbital
0:
”Alexa, turn on Orbital Shower”
”Alexa, turn off Orbital Shower”
”Alexa, set Orbital Shower to 35 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: all things orbital
des:
This is where you Control your Orbital devices for smarter water use at home. You can use All things Orbital to turn on, turn off and change temperature of your Orbital Shower by voice. Furthermore, ask your device for data such as your current filer status, high score and water used/saved.

Use the My Water by Orbital Systems app to set up your Orbital Shower and then link your account to All things Orbital and your device(s) will be discovered automatically.

Create your own shower routines with Alexa Routines.
